about_the_game:
Every now and then, Batabada hosts the most exciting and glorious competition ever created by fishkind : the Grand Bubble-eye Champion’s Cup. This tournament of the first water, gathers countless competitive Bubble-eye hustlers from all around the ocean.

They like going by the name of Chiki-Chiki.
You might ask, “what is so special about this fishie-specie ?”

First of, they look fantastic.
Secondly, they can reach outstanding speed thanks to their strong native seahorse-power, at the cost of pretty challenging maneuverability.

Folks from far miles of sand came to witness first-class achievements, tragic yet comical events. And by fighting strong currents, entangled in seaweed, knocked away by coral turnstiles.. the fish with oversized cheeks will deliver, the best show ever.

The reefs are calling upon their new champion, and you just might have the chance of your life to take part.

Did someone say fishrace?


Yes we did.

Whether you’re here for Fun or for the Speedrun...


To play Chiki-Chiki, you will need a controller with 2 joysticks to impulse your bubble-eye fish’s cheeks to victory.

Easy to learn, awesome to master, the gameplay revolves around accuracy and physical simulations. Challenge everyone in this fun and frenzic 2D racing game, through a wide pan of crazy hurdles.

What’s in the demo?


• 4 gorgeous fishies
• 1 colorful racing maps
• Physic simulated environments filled with obstacles
• A local multiplayer 1v1 game mode
• A single player time attack game mode
• Awesome soundtracks

name: Chiki-Chiki Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700HQ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M
  • Storage: 169 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Chiki-Chiki is a multiplayer racing game staged in the colorful reefs of Batabada. This frenzic gameplay based on physics will make you want to challenge all of your friends & family through a smashing versus experience. Make sure you samba hard.
